io.spine.server.commandbus

Class Transform

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.commandbus.CommandSequence<io.spine.core.CommandId,R,B,S>
      • io.spine.server.commandbus.Transform

  • @Internal
public final class Transform
extends CommandSequence<io.spine.core.CommandId,R,B,S>
    A command sequence containing only one element.
